title: Galactic Designs.
content: Galactic Designs is a website dedicated to showcasing the most stunning abstract art inspired by the cosmos. Our curated collection features intricate patterns and bright colors that will transport you to another galaxy. Whether you're looking for a new desktop wallpaper or inspiration for your next creative project, Galactic Designs has something for everyone. Explore our collection today and discover the beauty of the universe in every piece. ðŸš€ðŸŒŒâœ¨

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a swirling galaxy, with bright colors and intricate patterns."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
